attributes.action: Re-instate parents choice of whole milk in primary schools in England
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The government think that 1/3 of a pint of milk a day will make my child obese.

Statutory School Food Regulations, laid down by central Government, and applicable to all maintained schools in England state that: 

"no milk other than low fat milk may be provided in schools, except that whole milk may be provided up to the end of the school year in which they [children] turn five".

This has been introduced without reference to parental choice. What next?

Please add your name to this petition to overturn this ridiculous regulation.
